Articles.Content:
The goal of this mission is to establish a small permanent research base in a previously unnamed Crater on the surface of the Mun.

During his apporach, Jeb noticed that the intended landing site was far more steep than thought, so he flew deeper into the Crater. The Crater is now named Sneaky Crater because of this incident.

Also the Kethane scanning probe failed temporarily for seemingly no reason, until Mission Control noticed that Kerbin had Eclipsed the Sun, causing the probe to run out of power:

More as soon as I continue the construction of the base.

Update: KAS blew up my base while I was quicksaving...no way to save it.

Edited October 8, 2013 by SargeRho
